General.Name: Binggrae
General.Description: Binggrae Co., Ltd. engages in production and distribution of dairy products in South Korea and internationally. It offers ice cream, milk/cheese, fermented milk, coffee, juices, beverages, and snacks/desserts under, and nutritional supplements under various brands. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Daeil Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Binggrae Co., Ltd. in February 1982. Binggrae Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Namyangju, South Korea.

3.Name: Mr. Sang-Min  Yoon
3.Title: Sr. Managing Director of Management Information
